name: 3sky prototype
description:
Small physics-based prototype. Mostly about physical rope.

Controls: mouse and just LMB.

Press not on the ship to accelerate.

Drag from ship to any side to lunch harpoon.

Harpoon can connect with stone in only the first pair of seconds.

If the harpoon is connected, press on the ship to disconnect.

To gather and reload the chain make a disconnected harpoon meet the ship.

https://github.com/Artaniel/PhysChainPrototype
